subject: Hockey, Ice
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: The Slovakian defensemen Martin Marincin and Peter Hrasko have been issued multigame suspensions for hits to the head during a 6-1 loss to the United States.
snippet: The Slovakian defensemen Martin Marincin and Peter Hrasko have been issued multigame suspensions for hits to the head during a 6-1 loss to the United States.
